name: Little League World Series Baseball: Double Play
overview: Up to 36 teams to choose from -8 U.S., 8 International and 20 customizable World Series Mode - Play your way to Williamsport, PA and compete in authentic stadiums as part of the Little League World Series Authentic Equipment - use Louisville Slugger bats, Wilson helmets, Easton catchers gear and more Enhanced Character Creation and Collectibles - customize your batting, pitching and fielding style while collecting hundreds of usable unlockables Skill Challenges - Play with up to 4 players in a variety of challenges such as Homerun Tourney, Batting Frenzy, Pitching Darts and more Up to 36 teams to choose from -8 U.S., 8 International and 20 customizable World Series Mode - Play your way to Williamsport, PA and compete in authentic stadiums as part of the Little League World Series Authentic Equipment - use Louisville Slugger bats, Wilson helmets, Easton catchers gear and more Enhanced Character Creation and Collectibles - customize your batting, pitching and fielding style while collecting hundreds of usable unlockables Skill Challenges - Play with up to 4 players in a variety of challenges such as Homerun Tourney, Batting Frenzy, Pitching Darts and more
